actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 3:00 p.m. on January 25, 2024.

Pursuant to 22 U.S.C. 276L, and the order of the House of January 9, 2023, the Speaker appointed the following members of the House to the British-American Interparliamentary Group: Mr. Crow, Mr. Meeks, Ms. DelBene, Mr. Gomez and Ms. Matsui.

actions-list.header: ADJUSTMENT OF THE WHOLE NUMBER OF THE HOUSE
actions-list.actionItem: Under clause 5(d) of Rule XX, the Chair announced to the House that, in light of the resignation of the gentleman from Ohio, Mr. Johnson, the whole number of the House is 432.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by Pastor Zack Randles, Waterfront Church, Washington DC
The Speaker designated the Honorable Jim Banks to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
